item.title: UTCTF recur challenge
item.description: Over the weekend, I participated in the UTCTF 2021 but was unable to spend a lot of time on the challenges. One of the challenge I worked on was the recur challenge in the Reverse Engineering category. The challenge was not that hard but I had fun working on it so I decided to write a writeup for the challenge. The challenge had a binary file attached with it and the description of the challenge was -
